entry.title: oh, the pain!
entry.content: Ugh... I woke up this morning with a nagging pain in my right knee. It kinda improved through the day, so I wasn't too worried about it, but when I tried to run on it this evening, it really hurt. So I'm gonna keep to the bike for awhile. I remember having this problem (which I think is patellar tendonitis) during the last marathon and I remember that it got better pretty quick, so I'm praying it's the same this time.
